The concentration of Cu in soil samples of Ahvaz ranged from 8–1060 mg.kg −1, with an average of 185±167 mg.kg −1. This concentration is noticeably higher than the Ahvaz baseline soil-Cu concentration of 29.5± 3.7 mg.kg −1, however, the mean Cu value is markedly greater than 46 mg.kg −1 found in 34 European cities
